name: Pointless Button
description:
So you are interested in this game, huh? Play it! It's just $1, and a short clicker game with craziness ready to be unleashed. Bananas! Apples! Peaches! You name it! Get ready to find fruits spawning randomly across your screen.

FYI: This is my first game ever made, so any donation would be greatly appreciated, even the purchase of the game. This also means that the game is not 100% polished, but updates are still well on the way.
